body: ...to a link under the Themes dropdown in the preferences dialog.
author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)
title: Move "More Themes Online" option from Settings menu...

comments.body:
I hate google. Whenever a task is "Fixed" I would expect it to disappear from my list of "open" tasks. Sometimes it does and sometimes (as in this case) it doesn't. I hate google.

**Status:** Done
comments.author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)

comments.body:
Google assumes a separate QA team that can verify any fixes by Development.

I might go on a verification mission...
comments.author: [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/)
